name: High income below ACC cap
description: Individual earning NZD 120,000 per year (no IETC, ACC levy not yet capped)

sources.description: Calculated using 2025-26 PAYE rates, ACC levy, and IETC from IRD
sources.notes: PAYE: Brackets at 10.5%, 17.5%, 30%, 33% (income below top bracket). ACC: 1.67% on full income (below cap of $152,790). IETC: $0 (income above $70,000).
